text: Sorry for the delay - hm, OK I see. I might forward this along to someone on the apps team that might be able to dig further. Do you have a link to the app config page in your developer account handy?
:eyes: This looks like a bug in our app config UI. I’ll pass it along to that team.
hey thanks for the response - turned out to be user error on my part!
nice, glad you got it working!
Quick followup - sounds like we already had a ticket filed for this issue and the team is working on it ask we speak. I’ll let you know as soon as I have any updates.
Hey Mark, that was me I'd say :+1: Thanks for the update
Sounds like there’s a fix in place that should be going out later today or tomorrow.
